snippet: HERTZEN--Barbara Arline, 71, passed away on March 19, 2016. Daughter of the late Rabbi Rabbi Abraham Hertzen and the late Thelma Hertzen Hurwitz, beloved sister to Michele Friedman and Elliot Hurwitz, loving aunt to Andrea and Ben Abbate, Robert Friedman and Whitney, Josh and William Hurwitz. She lived life with gusto and humor and will be missed by all who knew her. Services will be held privately. Donations can be made in her memory to the Foundation for Jewish Camp: www.jewishcamp.org. 1/3
